Adventure Guildsman:
At the time of disarmament call, pets, spot a private buff will automatically disappear. When using points accept buff, please take note of this fact. For adventurers who are able to provide pets or spot a private buff below. The Buff Set for Warriors: has Berserker Spirit, Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Blessed Body, Haste, Agility and Vampiric Rage. The Buff Set for Wizards: has Berserker Spirit, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Body, Blessed Soul, Magic Barrier, Empower and Acumen.
Buff Set for Warriors - 4000 points.
Buff Set for Wizards - 2100 points.
After selected, receiving individual buff.
